code: import React,{useEffect}from"react";import{BrowserRouter as Router,Routes,Route,useNavigationType,useLocation}from"react-router-dom";import Root from"./pages/root";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const action=useNavigationType();const location=useLocation();const pathname=location.pathname;useEffect(()=>{if(action!=="POP"){window.scrollTo(0,0);}},[action,pathname]);useEffect(()=>{let title="";let metaDescription="";switch(pathname){case"/":title="";metaDescription="";break;}if(title){document.title=title;}if(metaDescription){const metaDescriptionTag=document.querySelector('head > meta[name="description"]');if(metaDescriptionTag){metaDescriptionTag.content=metaDescription;}}},[pathname]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Routes,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Root,{})})});}export default App;
